content: this pattern is for a snowman coaster set the set includes a snowman head and two coasters the head is too small in diameter and is not meant to be used as a coaster skill level intermediate finished size the large coaster is about 4-1/2 in diameter medium coaster is about 4 and the snowman head is about 2-3/4 in diameter yarn medium weight #4 cotton yarn free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-snowman-coasters/ by purchasing a pdf file you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format product safety this is a virus free pdf it contains embedded links to reputable websites all links are to trusted sources but discretion is always advised when using links to external websites gpsr representative ciara doyle 6 killallon close c15 y5f9 ireland email ciara@thefairythorn ie
